menuItems.title: Tandoori Chicken
menuItems.description: Tender chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked to perfection in a traditional clay oven.

menuItems.title: Paneer Tikka
menuItems.description: Chunks of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) marinated in spices and grilled to perfection.

menuItems.title: Butter Chicken
menuItems.description: Tender chicken simmered in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy, flavored with butter and aromatic spices.

menuItems.title: Vegetable Biryani
menuItems.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables, herbs, and spices, served with raita.

menuItems.title: Masala Dosa
menuItems.description: A South Indian specialty, crispy crepe filled with a spiced potato filling, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

menuItems.title: Gulab Jamun
menuItems.description: Soft and spongy milk solids dumplings soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup, served warm.
